label: SpecialQuery
comment: A special question or request for information.

datatypeProperties.comment: A content, expressed as text, of this note.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value for the latest response to this special query.
A date, time, date time, or other date time value of a response of the exchanged document.
The code specifying the response status for this special query.
A subject, expressed as text, of this specified note.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value when this special query was submitted.
The name, expressed as text, of the person submitting this special query.
The identifier for the version of this exchanged declaration.

referencedBy.comment: A special question or request for information.
